name: part_009
file: tmp_【#不知火フレア生誕祭LIVE】遅れてやってきた私の誕生日LIVE！【不知火フレア⧸ホロライブ】 [H1vf2vF1LmE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: MC section between Shiranui Flare and Nakiri Ayame following their performance.
Song performance of 'Itsumo Kono Basho de' (Always in this place).

subtitles.original: にー！おにー！
subtitles.english: Ni! Oni!

subtitles.original: （笑い声）
subtitles.english: (Laughter)

subtitles.original: Yeah！ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Yeah! Thank you so much!

subtitles.original: ええ！ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Yes! Thank you so much!

subtitles.original: またあの、今度はあの、何かゲームとか一緒に。
subtitles.english: Also, next time, let's play some games together.

subtitles.original: うん！ぜひお願いします！
subtitles.english: Yeah! I'd love to!

subtitles.original: やった！あと雑談もさせてもらいます！
subtitles.english: Hooray! And let's do a chatting stream too!

subtitles.original: いや、やった！待ってます！
subtitles.english: Yay! I'll be waiting!

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます！またお願いします！
subtitles.english: Thank you! Let's do it again!

subtitles.original: はい！ありがとうねー！
subtitles.english: Yes! Thank you!

subtitles.original: 愛してるぞ、百鬼！
subtitles.english: I love you, Nakiri!

subtitles.original: うーー！
subtitles.english: Uuuu!

subtitles.original: FPの展開！展開！
subtitles.english: FP deployment! Deployment!

subtitles.original:
いつもこの場所で
作詞・作曲　志倉千代丸
subtitles.english:
Always in this place
Lyrics/Composition: Chiyomaru Shikura

subtitles.original: いつか僕らが未来振り返る時には
subtitles.english: Someday, when we look back at the future

subtitles.original: いつもこの場所で君が笑って
subtitles.english: You'll always be smiling in this place

subtitles.original: 残酷に過ぎゆく時の中で
subtitles.english: Amidst the cruelly passing time

subtitles.original: 探し求めていたもの
subtitles.english: The things I've been searching for

subtitles.original: すれ違う世界に閉じ込められた
subtitles.english: Locked away in a passing world

subtitles.original: 目に見えぬ光
subtitles.english: An invisible light

subtitles.original: 特別なほど愛するものへ
subtitles.english: To the one I love so much it's special

subtitles.original: 打ち明けられずにいた
subtitles.english: That I haven't been able to open up to

subtitles.original: 過ごした日々の一つ一つが
subtitles.english: Each and every day we spent together

subtitles.original: 戸惑いを響に変える
subtitles.english: Changes confusion into resonance

subtitles.original: いつか僕らが未来振り返る時には
subtitles.english: Someday, when we look back at the future

subtitles.original: いつもこの場所で君が笑って
subtitles.english: You'll always be smiling in this place

subtitles.original: 重ね合ったみんなの思いが
subtitles.english: Everyone's overlapping feelings

subtitles.original: 世界線を作る
subtitles.english: Will create a world line

subtitles.original: どんな雨にも負けぬ信じ合える気持ち
subtitles.english: A feeling of mutual trust that won't give in to any rain

subtitles.original: この空の観測者
subtitles.english: The observer of this sky

subtitles.original: この空は明日の証明
subtitles.english: This sky is the proof of tomorrow

subtitles.original: いつまでも変わらぬ景色なんて
subtitles.english: A scenery that never changes

subtitles.original: 絶対に叶わぬ夢
subtitles.english: Is a dream that will never come true

subtitles.original: 奇跡のような出会い　せめてあの日を
subtitles.english: A miracle-like encounter, at least that day

subtitles.original: 消したりしないで
subtitles.english: Please don't let it disappear

subtitles.original: 好きな気持ちが勇気に変わる
subtitles.english: My feelings of love turn into courage

subtitles.original: 科学的じゃないけど
subtitles.english: It's not scientific, but...

subtitles.original: 戸惑いのない君の言葉が
subtitles.english: Your words, without hesitation

subtitles.original: 本当の答えを導く
subtitles.english: Guide me to the true answer

subtitles.original: あの僕らが出会い大切な何かを
subtitles.english: On that day we met, something precious

subtitles.original: いつもこの場所で探していたね
subtitles.english: We were always searching for it in this place

subtitles.original: 何気なく過ぎゆく時間の
subtitles.english: The meaning of the time

subtitles.original: その意味を知ってる
subtitles.english: That passes by casually, I know it

subtitles.original: たとえどんなに二人離れてしまっても
subtitles.english: No matter how far apart we become

subtitles.original: いつもこの場所で繋がっている
subtitles.english: We'll always be connected in this place

subtitles.original: 切なくてロマンティックだね
subtitles.english: It's painful and romantic, isn't it?

subtitles.original: まだ知らぬ明日
subtitles.english: A tomorrow we don't yet know

subtitles.original: いつか僕らが未来振り返る時には
subtitles.english: Someday, when we look back at the future

subtitles.original: いつもこの場所で君が笑って
subtitles.english: You'll always be smiling in this place

subtitles.original: 重ね合ったみんなの思いが
subtitles.english: Everyone's overlapping feelings...
